Pre-Game Insights: Andrew Jett suggests taking the Chicago White Sox on a value play due to Sean Burke's performance in his last three outings, with a 1-0 record and 3 earned runs in 14.0 innings.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Chicago White Sox swept a series versus the Los Angeles Angels 3-2, 4-3, and 7-0 this week.
Others: Eight of the White Sox's last nine games have gone UNDER the total runs line.
Six of the last seven games between the White Sox and Tigers at Comerica Park have gone UNDER the total runs line.
